snippet.description: Hyponatremia: eMedicine Pediatrics: Cardiac Disease and Critical Care Medicine Overview: Hyponatremia is defined as serum sodium (Na) concentration of less than 135 mEq/L. snippet.description: Right Middle Lobe Syndrome: eMedicine Pediatrics: General Medicine Overview: Right middle lobe syndrome (RMLS) generally refers to atelectasis in the right middle lobe of the lung.
